titles.title: A joint resolution designating the week of May 24 to May 30, 1987, as "Fight Leukemia Week".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 4/8/1987--Introduced. Designates the week of May 24 to May 30, 1987, as Fight Leukemia Week. Authorizes and requests the President to issue a proclamation calling upon the people of the United States to support research being performed to eradicate leukemia and its related diseases.
